name: ONYX ~separate dream~
description:
WARNING

This game contains unsettling content. Please refrain from playing if you are sensitive to depictions of gore or unreality, or have physical/mental health conditions that could be aggravated by horror.

                     Click here to see a more detailed content warning.Descriptions of gore, violence, murder, dismemberment (loss of limbs), paranoia, recurring nightmares, jump scares, unreality, derealization, bullying (physical and verbal), eyes as a source of horror, gaslighting, and a bleak tone at many points.

This list may not be exhaustive and you should play this game at your own discretion.

----------

STORY

Leo is a teen who lives a nice, carefree life with his friends in a small town.

He's happy with the way things have been as of late.

Then he starts having nightmares.

In the darkness of the night, the same images of him being torn apart in front of a pair of eyes repeats in his mind.

Unsettled, he sets out to figure out the meaning of these dreams.

As the nights pass, his peaceful life slowly begins to dissipate into something stranger.

The familiar grows unfamiliar. Regular people begin to act strange. Things that were once hidden reveal themselves.

Even dreams and reality begin to blend into each other...

ONYX ~separate dream~ is a mysterious psychological horror visual novel by LUNE where your inner world and the world around you slowly twist into each other. It sports an art style inspired by early visual novel games and features 90,000 words and 4 endings. It is around 4+ hours long.
